title: Incompetent dumb teammates
content: For the Cse bootstrap,  our idea was changed 5 times in the whole 4 hours by my DUMB ASS TEAMMATES... this is so bad bruh... they completely destroyed my good idea by their stupid additions ... I might have ptsd by the end of this session due to the stupid pitch

comments.body: You're crying now? You'll love group projects.
Lol you got no idea of your future in PES
It's just a workshop man don't take stress. At least you have learnt a few things useful for your future.
Just wait till course projects, hackathons and capstone starts
It's just bootstrap da so chill

Its basically a "Welcome to Team-based assignments"  
This will continue to happen during miniprojects as well

Wait, bootstrap? Relax brodie, nobody gives a shit about bootstrap. If this is how you feel for this, I can't imagine how you'll feel when your 10 credit final year project comes upðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚. This isn't that important and no teacher cares about what you do, just try getting along with your teammates and try making some friends
